sentences.sContent: I locked the door and dropped the keys in my purse.
sentences.sCn: 我锁上门，然后把钥匙丢进手提包里。

phrases.pCn: 管钱；控制财权；钱袋口上的绳子
n. 围网；捕鱼用的袋网
装硬币的钱包；钱包；零钱袋

trans.tranCn: (女士)手提袋；(国家、家庭、团体等的) 财力
trans.tranOther: a bag in which a woman carries her money and personal things
if you purse your lips, you bring them together tightly into a small circle, especially to show disapproval or doubt
